meanings.sent1: The rejecter refused to accept the gift.
meanings.sent2: The rejecter threw the broken toy in the trash.
meanings.sent3: The rejecter at the party only wanted to play with one specific toy.
meanings.sent4: Her cat was a rejecter of any food that wasn't fresh.
meanings.sent5: The rejecter's actions spoke louder than words.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that rejects.
meanings.sent1: The rejecter of the proposal surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The rejecter in the group always had a critical eye.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine acted like a rejecter, returning the same snack multiple times.
meanings.sent4: The old car was a rejecter of new technology.
meanings.sent5: The rejecter's presence was felt throughout the meeting.
